name: Word Harvest
description:
WORD HARVEST

This year’s harvest will be bountiful…if you can get rid of all the debris cluttering up your field! Seems like every season there are new boulders, tree stumps, and even a few shallow graves that appear from nowhere… oh well, you better get to work cleaning up all the garbage so it doesn’t wreck your tractor!

In Word Harvest, you play as a farmer harvesting the season’s crops. Each crop you successfully pick up gives you points towards your final score. As your tractor moves across the screen, obstacles will sometimes appear in your path. If you type the word on the obstacle, it disappears - but if you don’t, it will jam your tractor, causing you to lose a life and miss picking up crops for a short period of time.

Created for Ludum Dare 52
